mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Hosted version of the world's most popular CMS platform. Offered more flexibility and customization through plugins but with a steeper learning curve compared to Wix's drag-and-drop interface.

2015.note: Hosted version of the world's most popular CMS platform. Offered more flexibility and customization through plugins but with a steeper learning curve compared to Wix's drag-and-drop interface.
